description:
Unable to accept his team`s `easy` win, Recca challenges the leader of Team Kuu, Kukai, to a final showdown to determine everything. But Kukai`s not the saint he`s described as.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futsu no Hyouhen! Mouhitotsu no Kao!!
The Other Face: Transformation of the Saint!!
